## Function (outputs mean and variance angle during trials)
```{r}
visualize_angles <- function(data_path){
  data <- read.csv(data_path, header = T)
  RollingMean <- rollapply(data$APAngle.deg., width = 15000, FUN = mean, by = 500, align = "center")
  RollingVariance <- rollapply(data$APAngle.deg., width = 15000, FUN = var, by = 500, align = "center")
  plot(RollingMean)
  plot(RollingVariance)
}
```

# Trial 1 - Cosine Stability
```{r}
visualize_angles("StabilityStudy/trial1_cleaned.csv")
```

# Trial 2 - Inverted Pendulum
